name: Pew Pew Overdrive
description:
Pew Pew Overdrive is a classic twin stick shooter for mobile (Android only), that aims to offer quick bursts of action to the player.  Just download it on your phone, install it and enjoy!

This is the first time our team had tried making a mobile game so we tried making something a little familiar. This is why we made a 2nd twin stick shooter in a row
